Give the correct Passive form of-My teacher embodies all the good qualities.
options: All the good qualities are embodied by my teacher

question: Choose the correct indirect speech- She asked me “Are you happy in your new job?”
options: She asked me if I had been happy in my new job
She asked me whether I am happy in my new job
She asked me if I have been happy in my new job
She asked me if I was happy in my new job
answer: She asked me if I was happy in my new job
